short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly and easily use site-specific bookmarks on any site

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Quickly add and access favourite pages for specific sites. Favourites are saved in your bookmarks as well, so will be shared across all your devices.
